blocks.title: Sufi Impact on Professions
blocks.html:
When work becomes worship, and every role becomes a reflection of the Divine.

Sufism transforms professions into sacred trusts, where leading, healing, teaching, building, or coding is not just a duty, but a path to presence. Here, every action is remembrance, every service is sanctified, and every profession becomes a prayer in motion.

cards.title: The Statesman
cards.text: I don't rule by power,I serve where Divine Justice writes the laws unseen

cards.title: The Administrator
cards.text: I govern the unseen, where divine order flows through systems, not just signatures

cards.title: The Court
cards.text: I don't argue cases,I defend truth where voices break, and justice breathes

cards.title: The Businessman
cards.text: I walk the marketplace as mosque, every transaction a test, every profit a prayer

cards.title: The Ecologist
cards.text: I don't just heal the earth, I remember it as a living breath of the Divine

cards.title: The Developer
cards.text: I don't build apps, I script realities where Divine Will runs every backend

cards.title: The Witness
cards.text: Report with reverence, when truth is sacred, every word becomes a mirror of God

cards.title: The Physician
cards.text: My hands touch flesh, my gaze sees spirit. I heal in God's name

cards.title: The Police Officer
cards.text: I wear no badge but conscience, my authority flows from Light, not law alone

cards.title: The Teacher
cards.text: My chalk is dhikr, each word drawn to stir the soul's forgotten script

cards.title: The Student
cards.text: I don't collect knowledge, I empty myself, so Truth may pour in freely

cards.title: The Architect
cards.text: I carve the unseen into form, where geometry bows before the Beloved's rhythm
